CustomObject.description:
To submit Extraction Request please update Opportunity field 'Payroll Current Prior Method' to be one of below-
a) ADP Run
b) ADP Workforce
c) QuickBooks Desktop Software (Professional, Premier, and Enterprise)
d) QuickBooks Online (Simple Start, Essentials, and Plus)
e) Intuit Online (Basic, Enhanced, Full Service and Intuit Accountant)
f) Paylocity
g) Paycom
h) Gusto
i) Sure Payroll
j) Paychex to Paychex
CustomObject.label: ER_PayrollCurrentPriorMethod
